column1: Report title: Stalking Victimization in the United States NCJ 224527
Data source: National Crime Victimization Survey
Author(s): Katrina Baum, Shannan Catalano, Michael Rand and Kristina Rose
Note: Estimates exclude 1.2% of stalking and 10.2% of harassment victims due to missing data. All victims experience at least one unwanted behavior in the year before the interview.
